    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminAccessRequest
     
    AdminActionsDialog
    This class displays a dialog showing admin actions that staff and instructors can request access to perform.
    AdminHomePage
     
    AdminSetupPage
    The AdminSetupPage class handles the setup process for creating an administrator account.
    AdminUserReset
     
    Answer
    Represents an answer to a question in the QandA system.
    Answers
    Manages a collection of answers in the QandA system.
    DatabaseHelper
    The DatabaseHelper class is responsible for managing the connection to the database, performing operations such as user registration, login validation, and handling invitation codes.
    DatabaseHelper2
    The DatabaseHelper2 class is responsible for managing question and answer operations in the database.
    DatabaseHelper3
    The DatabaseHelper3 class is responsible for managing review, feedback, and chat operations in the database.
    EmailRecognizer
     
    FirstPage
    FirstPage class represents the initial screen for the first user.
    HW4Test
    A test class for validating the implementation of staff user stories: Staff viewing all interactions Staff sending private messages to students Staff responding to student messages Staff flagging inappropriate content Staff requesting student restrictions Instructors restricting/unrestricting students
    InstructorHomePage
     
    InvitationPage
    InvitationPage class represents the page where an admin can generate an invitation code.
    Jtest
    A test class for validating user input validation operations.
    Jtest2
    A test class for validating the operations of the Questions and Answers system and its database interactions.
    Jtest3
    A test class for validating the operations of the Review System and its database interactions.
    Jtest4
    A test class for validating the implementation of the user stories: Students can search answered and unanswered questions using a search bar Students can search for reviewers using a dropdown filter Reviewers can display their details about their experience and background Reviewers can access a list of reviews given to them by the students Instructors can assign scores to reviewers based on specific parameters Students can see the assigned score for each reviewer Instructors, staff and admins can see a list of admin-specific actions An instructor and staff can request the ability to use admin-specific actions An admin can disable the instructor's ability to use admin-specific actions Admin, instructors and staff can see a list of closed requests
    NameRecognizer
     
    PasswordEvaluator
     
    Question
    Represents a question in the QandA system.
    Questions
     
    Request
     
    Reviewer
    The Reviewer class handles all operations related to reviews including adding reviews, viewing reviews, and displaying review dialogs.
    ReviewerHomePage
    This page displays the reviewer interface with ability to view questions, provide answers, and add reviews.
    ReviewerProfile
     
    ReviewerRequest
     
    SelectRole
     
    SetupAccountPage
     
    SetupLoginSelectionPage
    The SetupLoginSelectionPage class allows users to choose between setting up a new account or logging into an existing account.
    StaffHomePage
    This page displays the staff interface for viewing questions, answers, reviews, and feedback.
    StartCSE360
     
    StudentHomePage
    This page handles the student interface for viewing and managing questions and answers.
    User
    The User class represents a user entity in the system.
    UserHomePage
    This page displays a simple welcome message for the user.
    UserLoginPage
    The UserLoginPage class provides a login interface for users to access their accounts.
    UserNameRecognizer
     
    UserPasswordReset
     
    WelcomeLoginPage
    The WelcomeLoginPage class displays a welcome screen for authenticated users.
